Detailed Description

TimeSpan is used to represent a time period in seconds.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TimeSpan::TimeSpan (   )  [inline]
 

Constructs an zeroed TimeSpan object.

TimeSpan::TimeSpan (  UINT32  seconds  )  [inline]
 

Constructs a TimeSpan object and initializes it with seconds.

TimeSpan::TimeSpan (  UINT  hours,
UINT  minutes,
UINT  seconds = 0
) 
 

Constructs a TimeSpan object with hours and minutes and optional seconds. The values are absolut values and no relative values like in the Time object.
